meanings.sent1: The scarts flew gracefully over the ocean waves.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of scarts nesting on the cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The scarts squawked loudly, demanding attention from the other birds.
meanings.sent4: The scarts' wings glided effortlessly through the salty air.
meanings.sent5: The scarts' distinctive call echoed across the rocky shore.

meanings.sent1: She scarts across the field to catch the runaway puppy.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel scarts up the tree to escape the approaching cat.
meanings.sent3: In a panic, he scarts around the room looking for his lost keys.
meanings.sent4: Time scarts by when you're having fun with friends.
meanings.sent5: The wind scarts through the leaves, creating a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: a small cut or scratch on the skin
meanings.sent1: He noticed a scarts on his knee after falling off the bike.
meanings.sent2: The scarts on her arm stung a little when she touched them.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten left tiny scarts on the furniture with its claws.
meanings.sent4: The scarts from the rose bush reminded her of the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The scarts on his face told the story of a playful wrestling match.
